name: Attuned_Gaussians_Synchronized_FireControl_C
display_help: Enhances the to hit buff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHit.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_display_names: Gaussian's Synchronized Fire-Control: To Hit Buff/Recharge/Endurance Reduction
